posts.text: 我比较敬重的人的一个mad~ (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer1"),"autoplay":true,"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":true,"lang":"zh-cn//语言","screenshot":true,"hotkey":true,"preload":"auto","volume":0.9,"video":{"url":"/resources/video/hei.mp4","pic":"/resources/images/holy.png"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})()

我比较喜欢的一个静止画madI prefer a seishiga mad私のお気に入りの静止画madです (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer0"),"autoplay":true,"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":true,"lang":"zh-cn//语言","screenshot":true,"hotkey":true,"preload":"auto","volume":0.9,"video":{"url":"/resources/video/The Polestar.mp4","pic":"/resources/images/holy.png"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})()

posts.title: 真正意义上的第一稿
posts.text: #不知道这个能不能成功啊,其实只是一个测试嗯,该怎么说呢,最近目标还是找工作,学习,日语最近重新的反复看在学了但今天一天都在搞网站了,网站目前还需要学习,不断不断的建立暂且就这样吧,也不知道还能写些什么,以后看看能不能弄个html播放器(放点mad)
